item.title: When I look into your Holiness
item.description: Psalms 138:2 When I look into your holiness When I gaze into your loveliness When all things that surround me Become shadows in the light of you, When Iâ€™ve found the joy of reaching your heart, When my will becomes enthroned in your love, When all things that surround me Become shadows in the light of you. I worship you (2) The reason I live, is to worship you (2)
